    • Method Detail

      • DFS

        private static java.util.HashSet<Topic> DFS(Topic root)
        Iterative implementation of Depth-First-Search to discover all Topic nodes from a root node.
        Parameters:
        root - The root node from which the Depth-First-Search is to be performed.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of all the discovered topic nodes.

      • getAllTopicNodesFromRootNodeSet

        public static java.util.HashSet<Topic> getAllTopicNodesFromRootNodeSet(java.util.Collection<Topic> rootNodes)
                                                                throws TopicExceptions.NonRootNodeException
        Returns all topic nodes discovered from a collection of root nodes (including the root nodes).
        Parameters:
        rootNodes - A collection of root nodes that are to be explored.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of the discovered topic nodes from the DFS searches.
        Throws:
        TopicExceptions.NonRootNodeException - If a node in the collection was in fact not a root node.

      • getAllTopicNodesFromNodeSet

        public static java.util.HashSet<Topic> getAllTopicNodesFromNodeSet(java.util.Collection<Topic> nodes)
        Returns a HashSet of all the topics discovered from a collection of topic nodes (including the start nodes).
        Parameters:
        nodes - A collection of topic nodes.
        Returns:
        A HasSet with the discovered nodes.

      • getAllChildrenFromNode

        public static java.util.HashSet<Topic> getAllChildrenFromNode(Topic t)
        Retrieves all children from but (but not including) a Topic
        Parameters:
        t - The Topic node from which to start the child discovery
        Returns:
        A HashSet of the discovered children.

      • getAllLeafNodesFromNode

        public static java.util.HashSet<Topic> getAllLeafNodesFromNode(Topic t)
        Retrieves all leaf nodes discovered from (but not including) a Topic
        Parameters:
        t - The Topic node from which to start the leaf node discovery
        Returns:
        A HashSet of the discovered leaf nodes.
